Ji bo ku hun bi mezinvani spaaya Yezdan bikin, me (riy´ lıildana wan goryan) bi vi awai ji bona we ra hesai kiriye.Yezdan) bivi awai (riya) hildana wan (goriyan) daye nisan e we.
